pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, November 9, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

5:50 p.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Lille, France.

Canada Reception Centre
190 Clear Skies Private

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity of departure
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 5:10 p.m.
